name: Angular-truncate
body:
Angular Truncate This project is a filter for Angularjs to truncate text strings to a set number of characters or words and add ellipses when needed. Demo How to use angular truncate Include the javascript file. Inject the truncate filter into your app module. var myApp = angular.module('myApp', ['truncate']); When outputting text, apply the filter.

{{ text | characters:25 }} or {{ text | words:5 }}

By default, a word will not be truncated. Set the optional boolean after the character count to true.

{{ text | characters:25 :true}}
